job_description: RESEARCH FIELD(S)1         Social Sciences: Economics JOB DESCRIPTION          The Aix-Marseille School of Economics (AMSE) is inviting applications for one-year research grants starting in September or October 2022.         Any research field covered by AMSE is eligible. Applications are open both to French and to non-French students. Knowledge of French is not necessary. Students will be provided with a desk in of the AMSE buildings, in Marseille or Aix-en-Provence, and will participate to AMSE scientific activities. Students do not need to register as a PhD student at Aix-Marseille University but physical presence in AMSE facilities is required.         The monthly salary is around 1400 euros net of social contributions. The grant includes social security coverage. Participation to up to three high-level international conferences during the year will be funded. QUALIFICATIONS/SKILLS/EDUCATION & RESEARCH REQUIREMENTSStudents must be in their fourth year (preferably) or fifth year of PhD in economics in 2022-2023, and about to complete their PhD. APPLICATION DEADLINEApril 15, 2022 - call for applications STARTING DATE          September or October 2022 JOB LOCATION         Marseille (France) / Aix-en-Provence (France) REQUESTED DOCUMENTS OF APPLICATIONApplication procedureA detailed CV (education background, research projects undertaken before or parallel to the PhD, conference attendance, visiting positions,â¦).A doctoral research project and exact state of progress, with a detailed plan and status of each chapter (published, submitted, working paper, in progress, not started), also mentioning the AMSE researchers or themes of research with whom important interactions are likely to exist. This part of the application should not be more than 5-page long.A transcript of grades obtained during the two years of Masterâs study and for any other relevant degree.At least two recommendation letters, including one from the PhD advisor, sent directly and confidentially to bernadette.vouriot@univ-amu.fr. CONTACT TO APPLY WebsiteSecretary E-mail: bernadette.vouriot[at]univ-amu.frPhone: +33 (0)4 13 55 25 83
